content: **knitted shawl in drops merino extra fine or drops daisy piece is knitted top down with relief pattern ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern me-254 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** height measured along the middle = approx 48 cm width measured along the top side from side to side = approx 144 cm **materials** drops merino extra fine from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 300 g colour 08 light beige or use drops daisy from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 300 g colour 02 marzipan needles drops circular needle size 4 mm length 80 cm drops cable needle **knitting gauge ** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm 21 stitches in width and 42 row vertically in garter stitch = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
